subject: Re: [junit] XMLunit and other addons serverside
msgSnippet: ... Do it the other way: change BaseTestCase to extend XMLTestCase, then wrap your test suite in a ServletTestSuite (Cactus). Good luck. -- J. B. (Joe)
messageBody:
Espen Ã˜. Pedersen wrote:
>
> I want to use XMLUnit and other 3rd-party libraries in my tests.
>
> I have my own custom BaseTestCase, which inherits from ServletTestCase
> (cactus) and I'd like to use assertXXX from 3rd-party libraries, like
> XMLUnit in my tests.
>
> I cannot inherit directly from XMLTestCase as it inherits from TestCase.
>
> Is there a way to achieve this without reimplementing all the assert
> methods in XMLTestCase?

Do it the other way: change BaseTestCase to extend XMLTestCase, then
wrap your test suite in a ServletTestSuite (Cactus).

Good luck.
--
